name: Text Messaging Widget Example
description: A barebones http and websockets sample messaging app

APP_HOST_NAME.description: Enter an App name above, then re-enter it here.

PLATFORM.description: Enter your messaging platform provider (TWILIO or ZIPWHIP).

MOBILE.description: Enter your mobile phone number in E.164 format (+12065551212).

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: If using TWILIO, enter your Twilio Account SID, else leave blank.

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: If using TWILIO, enter your Twilio Auth Token, else leave blank.

TWILIO_LANDLINE.description: If using TWILIO, enter your Twilio landline phone number in E.164 format (+12065551212), else leave blank.

ZIPWHIP_LANDLINE.description: If using ZIPWHIP, enter your Zipwhip landline phone number in E.164 format (+12065551212), else leave blank.

ZIPWHIP_SESSION.description: If using ZIPWHIP, enter the Zipwhip Session key, else leave blank.
